about me

Iâ€™m a learner. Learning is one of the things I value most in life. Whether it is on a professional or personal level, it is important that a person improves their skill set and grows.

Currently, I am a software engineer I at InfoSpace, a web search and monetization company. I have been working on a small team, which is developing a new set of products for the ever changing landscape that is the tech industry. It has been a blast, and I am looking forward to my continued growth as an engineer.

One thing I love about software development is that you always get to learn new technologies. The stuff that I have been working with lately has been mostly AngularJS, but I have had opportunities to use Golang and Python, as well as a little .NET here and there.
